label: 祇園女御
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This consort of retired emperor Shirakawa is represented as giving birth through her relationship with the sovereign to the child given the name Taira no Kiyomori (1118-81), though other sources suggest that her younger sister gave birth to the future military strongman.
